ha_review: ABIN MAMAKI!. . . . wasan kwaikwayon Stella, samarwan stella, bada umarnin stella.. . . Shirin ya kasance masaniya. Na kasance a kan bakin gurin zamana har awanni 7 inata kallon duka shiri mai dogon zangon.
Yin shiri ne da ya shafi duniya wanda kuma aka sani cikin nutsuwa.

Babban shirin yara. . . . Ina tunanin the Mirror Boy babban shirin yara ne, mai sauƙi a ruhi, amma mai ƙarfi,mai tasiri kuma anyi shi dakyau. Sautin yayi kyau sosai,wanda ya bambamta kuma wadatacce, yana da ɗan jan hankali da kuma raba al'ada da ra'ayoyin zamani
Da naga Richard Mofe-Damijo (RMD) akan Ejiro, dan daba mai ritaya na haya kuma Ubangijin laifi, cikakken tashi ne daga rawar da yake takawa na yau da kullum na uba mai arziki, yana kashe shi.

Ranar 1st ga Agusta, a graduation party ya kawo fiye da abinda kowa yake tsammani.. . . . Shirin wasan kwaikwayo bayan gari ne da yake duba yanda iyali tafiyar da al'amuransu don su rayu gaban shi, kuma ya wannan gabatan ya mammane da wuya da gaban su. . . . . Lokacin bikin gama makaranta, mahaifin da ya kwance alaƙa,Dipo, ya dawo. Kowani member ɗin iyali tafiyarda da dawowanshi daban,kuma bayan haka mun gano yanda dole su raya tafiyar shi ta farko.Da muka ji dalilanshi na tafiya da dalilanshi na dawowa, tausayinmu ya motsa.. . . . . Anyi wasan kwaikwayon dakyau kuma labarin ya warware kanshi a hankali kuma a ɗabi'ance, ba tareda zaɓin ƙarshe zuwa gamsasshen bayani. Yana nishaɗantarwa don kallon shirin wasan kwaikwayo game Afican American da canza guri daga matsayin ra'ayi.

Abin so.... . . . fuloti mai kyau sosai, da haɗin zargi da camfi,ana iya hasashe har zuwa ƙarshe, tareda harɗewan fuloti mai kyau, aiki mai kyau, na faɗa soyayya da aiyukan Kunle Afolayan wana a koda yaushe yake aiki a shirye-shiryen shi, cikin wanda yake bada umarni, rubutawa da samarwa, mai aiki dayawa ... Abin so...

Doctor Lanre motsine mai ban sha'awa. . . . Na ji daɗin zama ɗaya daga cikin 'yan farko akan jirgin wannan shiri. Wannan motsi ne mai ban sha'awa. Shirin yanada wadataccen fuloti wanda aka ɗauka ba da ƙoƙari ba da aiyuka masu matuƙar kyau na jerin 'yan wasam. . . Wannan na kallo-dole ne.

Yanda Adenike, Gurira ke da ban mamaki: Fuskarta tayi haske a daidai ko tana tattare raɗaɗi ko farin ciki, kuma ta kamo hanyoyin da wannan matar, yawan aiki a tsohuwar ƙasa sosai, kuma ta jira don haɗewa da duniyar zamani.
mafi kyawun mafi kyau.

Shiri mai kyau.... . . . Shiri mafi kyau, a cikin zaman tashin hankali na gaba a Najeriya, tareda da duka matsalolon shi, fata a cikin gaskiya da mazantaka, ya juya tashin hankali, yayi kyau sosai, mata 'yan cikin wasan a ƙari akan kyawu ƙarfi da yin alwashi, halin rashin gaskiya ɗaukan alfanun yanke ƙauna da rashin mai taimako, guraren zamar ɗarɗar masu kyau , shiri mai kyau..
Shiri mai lambar yabo mai kyau. . . . Shiri mai lambar yabo mai kyau kuma jarumai matan sunada kyawu na ban mamaki kuma shirin yayi fice.
Babban labari. . . . Wannan shirin ne mai inganci ko wani lokaci. Yana faɗan labaran lalacewan al'umma. Babu daɗi sosai! gaskiya sosai!
Ya saka ni sha'awar neman sanin abu dayawa aka tarihin Najeriya. Duk shirin da ya sakani son neman sanin abu dayawa yana samun a ƙalla taurari 4 a littafi na.

Shiri mai kyawun ɗauke numfashi!. . . . Da farko ina ɗan tantama, da banida masaniya akan siniman Najeriya a baya.Amman, zuwa ƙarshen shirin ( an yishi dakyau mu bar wannan batun),Na gano cewa na shaida na ji- da gani ƙawatacce. bada shawarar shi matuƙa!
Shirin jin daɗi mai haɗin al'ada daidai. Abubuwa dayawa da za'a koya daga Super mata da tayi faɗa sosai dan riƙe matsayinta a cikin duniyar dake mamaye da maza. Shiri mai ɗumi da matuƙar kyau!

Ya kasance abin burgewa!!  Yi watsi da maganganu marasa kyau. . . . Gaskiya.Ya kasance mai busa hankali! Banma yarda a Najeriya aka ɗauka ba, samarwan na musamman ne kuma jerin 'yan wasan sun kasance  A1. Duk sunyi ɓangarensu da kyau kuma suka maida shi abin daɗi!
Nazari akan kyakkyawar alaƙa na ƙalubalen zama uwa.
Wani abu sabo. . . . Dukda ganin ƙarancin kimar shi - Ina tunani, Namaste wahala tabbas ya cancanci kallo na lokaci 1 don zama wani abu sabo kuma daban.
Shiri mai kyau!!!!. . . . Ina son layin labarin, ina son wasan kwaikwayon kuma ina son gaskiyan cewa labari ne gameda abinda yake faruwa dagaske a cikin al'ummar mu
Anyi Farming don kallon ɗan karen ƙunci, amma Idris tauraro ne a cikin yin, kuma Beckinsale baiyi kyau ba a Tilbury mafi soyuwa a gurin mama.
shiri mai daɗi.
A ba ma shirin ɗan lambar yabo. . Ina tunanin yanada ban sha'awa kuma yanada ɗan tashin hankalin rashin tausayi amman naga ya kamata a faɗi labarin.
Shiri mai matuƙar ban dariya. . . .  Wannan shiri yanada matuƙar ban dariya. A zahirance nayi dariya daga farko har ƙarshe.
Mai kyau. . Hmmm... Wannan shiri ne. MAI KYAU kuma hakane gameda shi.

yana yi na ƙarancin mintuna sittin da shida kawai, ' The Delivery Boy' bayanin ma'ana mai inganci na "Inganci a saman Yawa". Wannan shirin shine ɗaya daga cikin shirye-shirye mafi kyau da muka gani da ya fito daga Nollywood na "Young". Masu haɗawan sunada hankali mai kyau don kwatanta ingancin fasaha tareda labari mai kyau da yakeda sauƙi, duk da haka  yana saka jiɓinta da gujema zama wanda ake iya hasashe kamar mahaukatan 'yan uwan shi "Young" Nollywood ya wont don fitowa.. . . . Munji daɗin kallon wannan yanda suma kaɗan ɗin 'yan kallon da muka ji daɗin kallo dasu. Dukkan mu mun bar babban ɗaki taro da dana sani sifili. Kuma mun tabbatar zaku yi kuma. Lokacin da 'The Delivery Boy' yayi nesa da zama mafi kyau, zamu iya faɗa muku da ƙwarin gwiwa cewa; idan har akwai shirin Nollywood da ya cancanci taimako da biya don ganin shi, 'The Delivery Boy' shine. Yanada ƙarfin zuciya da kuma na cigaba na ban mamaki. Kayayyakin iya yin tafi. Tafi gareshi!
Shiri komai ne!

Anyi aiki gagarabadau. . . . Na kalla shirye-shiryen Najeriya da yawa. Ingancin zai iya bambamta in terms of layin labari, cinematogography, asalin wasan kwaikwayo, ingancin sauti. Wannan shirin ya zama gagarabadau ta kowace hanya.
Zuwan shekarun dramedy daya rasa hanyarshi a kan mugayen titinan Afirka ta zamani.

Nigerian Prince yana jan ku ciki, burge ku, da faɗa muku labari babba da ƙarfi ba tareda rasa kanshi ba. Shirin bai bada bayyanannen ƙarshen halayya mai kyau, babu bayyanannen mafita na mene, ko waye, daidai ko ba daidai ba.
Tsirowa a hankali zuwa abu mai kyau.Wannan shiri akan abokai biyu na yaranta wanda sukayi faɗa akan rashin daidaito na zama tare.
Farawan farko mai daraja. . . . Na gano wannan a Tubi kuma na ji daɗin shi. Yanada matsalolin shi amman bai cire daga yanda shirin yakeda girma ba. . . . Shiri ne mai girma
Fasaha dake koyi da rayuwa... ko shine?

Gaba ɗaya, ya kasance mai nishaɗantarwa amma kamar mafi yawan shirye-shiryen Nollywood, babu ƙarin wahalar fahimta; gayu masu kirki da marasa kirki ana yawan gano su a sauƙaƙe sosai kuma haka nan ta hanya ɗaya.
Wannan shirin da gaske yana buƙatan yabo dayawa kamar kyakkyawan tsarin takardu na yin shiri. Ban taɓa ganin shirin annoba irin wannan ba, sabon ra'ayi.
Inason wannan shiri, amman na kasa gane waye ya mutu da wanda bai mutu ba.shirine na ban tsoro, amman shekarata bakwai kuma ban da matsala. Zan bashi tauraro 6+.
Shirine na jin- daɗi, kuma labarin gaskiya a fili.
mai kyau. Wasan kwaikwayo da labari sunyi kyau, amman samarwa da gudanarwa zai iya zama ɗan fin haka. gaba ɗaya daidai.
Shiri mai ƙarfi wanda zai motsa maka zuciya.
Ɗan rashin sha'awa. Shiri mai kyau - Siyasar Britaniya....ha.
wasu guraren wannan shirin sunada ratsa jiki. kalle shi
Tasirin sauti mai matuƙar kyau. . . . Shirin yayi kyau dagaske. Jaruman sunda ƙwazo.Ƙaeshen ya kasance abin tambaya amma tasirin sautin sune mafi kyau da na taɓa ji a kowani shirin Najeriya har yau.
Shiri mai kyau amman na 18+. . . . Shiri mai kyau na 18+. Naji daɗin ko ina a shirin.
Shiri mai ban sha'awa da bada ƙarin haske . . . . Shirin ya so miƙa saƙonni da suke haɗe da mabambamtan ɓangarori na al'umma.Kusan kowane ɓangare yana da ɗaukan hankali.
Shirri mai zarra mai ban sha'awa. . . . Na yi da gaske ji daɗin wannan shiri tabbas... musamman da zama ɗaya wanda musamman ba babba bane a shirye-shiryen Najeriya (ko har yanzu Nollywood na ce?)
Nayi mamaki sosai.

Babban taku a masana'antar shirin Najeriya. . . . Jerin 'yan wasan sunyi kyau. Duka sun nuna rawar su dakyau isasshe, ya kasance kusan babu gargada. Wannan ya faɗi abu dayawa na yawancin shirye-shiryen Najeriya
Cinematogography ya kasance bayyananne. Cike da manyan jarumai, wasan kwaikwayon ya kasance ingantacce da taɓuwa a kan al'amuran dake damun Najeriya
Ya danganci 'yan Afirka a wasu ƙasashen. . . . Nayi magana ne a masaniya ta idan zama ɗan Afirka banda rayuwa a Afirka da kuma ƙoƙarin haka don samun sabon gida. Shirin ban mamaki!
Yana nuna rashawa a cikin ƙawa.
Wannan shirin  shirine na gaskiya kuma yanada kyau sosai da kuma motsarwa.
Matuƙar ban tsoro. . Layin labarin shine mai matuƙar muni,ban iya kawo kaina dan kallo har ƙarshe ba..
Lokuta dayawa, ba'a saka isasshen ƙoƙari a cikin bada labarin. Wannan shirin shirme ne.
Idan ko ta yaya, Idan kasan wani da yake cancantan hukuncin ka, kawai ka siya musu tiketi.
ɗaya daga cikin mafi muni. . . . daga ƙaurin sunan zanyi tsammanin babban shiri amman yana ɗaya daga cikin shiri mafi muni dana taɓa gani a tsawon lokaci.
Ina irin tonon shi da farko amman shirin yanada matsalan kaiwa da kawowa, yana buƙatan gyara, kuma yayi tsayi dayawa.
Shin wani daban ya yarda cewa jagoran yayi kamar giciye tsakanin Anthony Mackie da Daniel Kaluuya?
Shirmamman shiri.
Kiran' jinkirin ban mamaki.

Komai yayi kamar rashin manufa, ƙarami, kamar labarin ( wanda wasu lokutan ba'a fahimta ba na rashin yafiya) ba'a tsara shi sosai ba kamar yanda aka fitar dashi kawai kuma akayi sauri sauri a cikin shi.

Ban bada shawarar shi ma kowa ba. banda ko yara. Shiri mai ban haushi,'wani ranar uba' zai barka da ciwon kai. Tareda mummunan wasan kwaikwayo da fitaccen wawan layin babari, wannan shirmamman matakin ƙarshe mai kwaikwayon Disney uziri na shirin ban dariya sai saka kowa da kowa rashin sh'awar Nollywood har abada.Irin wannan sham.Kuma mummunar asara,wannan shine yake zuwa da rubuta labarai da samarda shirye-shirye tareda tunani ɗaya na tallata gurin shaƙatawa, amman mutane bai kamata su biya don kallon wannan dogon talla ba. Mun ƙarfafa bada shawara da ku tafi nesa daga datti idan kuna daraja lokaci da ƙarfin ku.
29 a cikin 100
wucacciyar dama.
Ɓata awa biyu gaba ɗaya. . Ba abinda na tsammani ba, kuma shirin yana cike da faɗan abin ban dariya na ban haushi kuma busashshe.
Labarin bai wani mun wani abu dayawa ba kuma ya zama ana iya hasashenshi sosai da kuma maimaici daga ƙarshe.
Ɓata lokaci. .  Ba'a wani bayyana labarin ba, baiyi hankali ba kuma saka mutumin Najeriya yana zagi da kalmar zagin jamaica ba Jamaica bane??.
Ba daga amfani da ban dariya dakyau na shirin ba, gudanarwa, faɗa da kora, amman daga ya rashin kyau da yayi yake, sai kuma kuyi mamaki.
Rom-com a ina... a madafa, hotel da ƙasa da muka gani anan basuyi kamar ana girki a ciki,rayuwa a ciki ko soyayya a ciki.
Inason na zama... ɗan ta'adda . . Abin mafi ban dariyan shirme dana kalla a tsawon lokaci.
Babu sha'awa. Yanada nishaɗantarwa. Babu burgewa.
ba'a bada shawara akanshi ba. Labarin makirci abin takaicin wanda rashin isashiyar baiwa ya bayar.
Ina son na so wannan shirin. . Amman kawai bazan iya ba. yana tafiya a hankali amman dukda hakan ana iya hasashenshi. Matuƙar rashin kyau.
Yi haƙuri, matuƙar rashin kyau a dukkan fanni. . Wani babbar asasar kusan awa biyu na rayuwata.
Midnight Crew' tukunna wani mummunan shirin ban dariya na ban ƙyama don kaucewa a sinima.
Wani yiwuwar yin nasara da aka lalata da rubutu marar kyau.
Papa Ajasco yazo sinima a wannan shirme na musamman da kuma da riyan ban dariya na rashin hankali.

Da gaske ina so na so wannan shirin. Ina son yawancin jaruman kuma ingancin samarwan yanada kyau, amma ko ya kasance 1 hr 34 yayi kamar ana ja har abada. Dole na tsaya kuma na fara wannan shirin a wasu lokutan kaɗan. A ƙarshe na gamashi bayan 'yan watanni.
Na tsani haka na ɓata lokacina ina kallon wannan shiri.
Abin haushin shine sunyi amfani da sautin sauti mai yawa har ƙarshe fim ɗin kuma ya taɓa haɗa fim ɗin yayi mai kamar shekaru talatin da ɗaya.
Bai rayu har izuwa darajar samuwa ba.
Cikakken shirme.
Yayi rashin kyau da gaba ɗaya ya rasa sautin gurin farko na shirin, hakan baiyi kyau ba amman yanada ababai dayawa da zai bayar.
Shiri marar kyau.
Yayi kyau har zuwa ƙarshe. . Kuskure marar kyau.
Nayi tsammanin fin haka.
A kusan tsayin awa biyu, Akasarin ' ƙiran Ubangiji' babu sha'awa, rashin ra'ayi da kuma ban tsoro.
An lalata yiwuwar yin nasara. . Na bar gurin kallon cikin ƙyama da abin kunya.
Wannan shine shiri mafi muni dana taɓa gani.
Tattaunawa mai rauni, rashin ƙwarewa a guraren yaƙi.
Fine Wine zai iya zama mai daɗi sosai,amma potential ɗin labarin ba'a explored ɗinshi gaba ɗaya ba
Ba'a bada shawararshi ba kwata-kwata.
Shirin marar ban sha'awa mai yawan ƙaurin suna. . . ci gaban 'yan wasan ya ɗanyi rashin kyau kamar yanda masu kallo zasu iya jin haushin wasu.
Dukda kasancewa Zeb Ejiro ne ya samar kuma Chico Ejiro ya bada umarni, Goliyat biyu na Nollywood, wannan 'Night Bus to Lagos' taƙi isowa lafiya. na casa'in. Asarar duka mone.
ba'a bada shawararshi ba. Mai sifilin asali harda ƙanƙanin ƙwarancewa.
Shiri marar kyau sosai.
Sabo. Jarumtaka. Rashin ɗa'a. Rashin ma'ana.

Labari mai alƙibla ɗaya, matsakaicin shiri a bisa adalci.. . . . Lionheart shiri ne da ya ja hankali a masana'antar Nollywood. Duba da tallafin ƙasar waje da ya samu daga Netflix, na yi tsammanin ganin yadda shirin zai kasance.. . . . Tun daga farko, shirin ya bayyana al'ada wajen nuna gine-ginen al'ada da kuma hira a yaren gida.. . . . Sai dai, labarin ya ɗauki alƙibla ɗaya tun daga nan, haka shirin ya cigaba.. . . . Shirin ya kasance babu fasaha sannan kowa ya san abun da za ayi a ɗauka ta gaba, har yanzu ban gama firgita daga ɗaukar wannan shirin na ban dariya ne ba.. . . . Duk da haka, ina yabawa kyawun ɗaukar shirin dan ya burge kuma mafi yawan manyan ƴan wasan sun yi ƙoƙari banda Peter Okoye da ya bayar da kunya.. . . . A bada umurni na farko, ba abun da za ace da Genevieve sai madalla da ta iya yin wannan shiri.. . . . A ƙarshe, babu tabbacin za ka ji daɗin kallon wannan shiri, sannan kar ka tsammaci wata chakwakiya.
inada abu akan fim da halayen da kuma saitin da suka zama na waje.
shiri mai manyan jarumai amman an zartar dashi a talauce.
Ba'a bada shawararshi ba. ' Devaju' asalin fim ɗin yarbawa ne.
Ba'a bada shawararshi  ma sinima ba. wannan shirin yanada ban haushi.
